message: Let's be fair and split it with 60% for me since I'm starting
I understand you want a larger share, but that offer isn't fair to me. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  Given the inflation rate,  accepting now is in your best interest.
I see you're willing to give me 45%, but I think I deserve a bit more. Considering the inflation, let's meet in the middle at 58% for me.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Your share is rapidly decreasing in value. I'm offering you 480,000 - take it now, or risk getting even less in the next round!
